import React from 'react'; import images from '../../assets/img/Coconut.webp' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCartShopping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import '../assets/Detalle.css'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; export default function Detalle ({producto}) { const mensaje =() =>{ toast.success('COMPRA EXITOSA!', { osition: "top-right", autoClose: 1000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, }); } return ( <>

{producto.descripcion}

stock :{producto.stock}

${producto.price}

<>

PRODUCTOS SIMILARES

) }
